Name: Tanium
Author: Tanium - support@tanium.com
Description: The [Tanium](https://www.tanium.com/) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Tanium Threat Response alerts as Microsoft Sentinel incidents as well as incorporate Tanium's real-time endpoint data.
WorkbookBladeDescription: The Workbooks provided by this solution depend on specific data sources setup from Tanium Connect. The Workbooks allow you to get insight into Tanium endpoint and module data directly from Microsoft Sentinel.
PlaybooksBladeDescription: The Playbooks provided by this solution allow adding real-time Tanium endpoint data and control to hosts associated with Microsoft Sentinel incidents.
AnalyticalRuleBladeDescription: This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.
